author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

SimG4Core/Configuration has 3 cfg's to test 3 steps of cmsRun in dd4hep scenario. Currently they all fail and to support that the corresponding cfg's in DDD are added to help the debugging.

#### PR validation:

The cfg's for DDD are tested to work

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-ft29 Add corresponding cfg's for DDD
